text: Ruhrstadion is a football stadium in Bochum, Germany and is the home stadium of VfL Bochum. It has a capacity of 27,599. The stadium was opened on 8 October 1911. It was known for sponsorship reasons as the rewirpowerSTADION from 2006 to 2016. == Other websites == * Official website Category:1911 establishments in Germany Category:Football stadiums in Germany Category:Buildings and structures in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Sport in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Bochum
title: Ruhrstadion
